Reviews.Title: Not the greatest
Reviews.Author: Jon
Reviews.Content: Got this camera for the 10x zoom and the ability to select shutter speed etc. That is all fine and dandy, but the Auto setting is terrible. If I ever just want to take some pictures without setting everything up, the pictures come out terrible. A large part of the problem is the white balance. Everything comes out extremely cool. I am now attempting to sell it even though I have only had the camera for about a month.

Reviews.Title: Good camera by fujifilm
Reviews.Author: Old King Cole
Reviews.Content: I have always purchased fujifilm cameras in the past and been very satified with all of them. The F72 EXR is no exception to this statement. The camera works very well and is easy to use. It has a variety of great features that are easy to understand such as the different "modes" you can select for taking pictures such as "party" or "landscape". I also like the black color as it adds a touch of class to the camera. Great camera overall.

Reviews.Title: The best pocket camera at this price
Reviews.Author: JJ "DIY"
Reviews.Content: I bought this refurbished F72EXR online 3 weeks ago. After playing it for 2 weeks and learning some tips online to use it, I'm very satisfied with this camera. It's an excellent pocket camera but it's also complicated to use. You have to follow the expert's suggestion on the settings to get the best out of it. It could be the best pocket camera for the price that I paid. So far, I have owned 6~7 pockets cameras and this one is the best.

Reviews.Title: Underated
Reviews.Author: Balto
Reviews.Content: This camera takes excellent pictures, but is not a do it all point and shoot take mediocre~bad pictures in any situation camera.The other reviews state that the colors are lacking and the temp is cool, well let me tell you this. this camera takes  accurate color pictures, not oversatured like most point and shoot cameras today. Want to unrealistic saturated colors? use photoshop, its easier to saturate than to desaturate trying to get accurate color reproduction.The low light pictures this camera take are above average even for today standards, you just need to know how to set it appropriately. Just google "How to shoot an EXR" and you will find how to shoot this camera effectively.The lens quality is excellent, it does have some effect but it is minimal and less than mostly any camera in this category.Aluminum body construction is great and makes the camera feel sturdy, the construction just feels premium compared to plastic body cameras.If you want a camera that just require "point and shoot" to take mediocre to bad pictures this camera ain't for you. This camera is capable of taking great pictures you just have to do your part and learn how to shoot it.

Reviews.Title: Poor indoor Camera
Reviews.Author: L. Burk
Reviews.Content: Takes extreamly poor indoor or low light photos, super grainy, and the color and lighting completely miss the mark.  I have played with this camera for over 2 years trying to get it to take a good indoor picture but with no success.

Reviews.Title: Abused in previous life...
Reviews.Author: Gary E. Stearns
Reviews.Content: The refurb that I just received is in worse condition than any camera that I have retired after 10+ years of use. It has paint missing, scrapes and dings in several places. I have purchased many refurbs over the years, but this is in by far the worst condition. It is going back...

Reviews.Title: poor condition
Reviews.Author: Alec
Reviews.Content: Camera has a lot of scrach and small hole on the surface. No as new as on the AD say "almost like new". it should use for long time.
